Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm not sure if this is an issue with one of my mods or rather 1.1 itself, but anyway: when I do EVA with a Kerbal, and then try to board the capsule again, it shows as if the Kerbal has boarded the craft, yet he/she is still outside the capsule!

Screenshot:

http://s31.postimg.org/nfunssf5n/image.png

My mod list (all of them updated):

http://s31.postimg.org/bou7y2ke3/image.png

 

If it's a mod issue, I have no idea which mod causes it. I tried disabling anything that seems relevant, but it didn't help.

 

Can somebody help me out? I'm running latest 1.1 build on Windows 10 64bit, Lenovo Z500 laptop.

Do you have any MM patches? In my case, I found it was caused by giving Command Pods KIS inventory space. I have read this is a stock bug that some mods (or mod cominations) exacerbate. I use most of the mods you do, and can't find any other obvious candidate.

2 minutes ago, monstah said:

Do you have any MM patches? In my case, I found it was caused by giving Command Pods KIS inventory space. I have read this is a stock bug that some mods (or mod cominations) exacerbate. I use most of the mods you do, and can't find any other obvious candidate.

Excuse me, what are MM patches?

Just now, aluc24 said:

Excuse me, what are MM patches?

Sorry, those are Module Manager files that do... stuff. If you don't know what they are, you probably have none (that you wrote yourself, that is. Some of those mods you have are just that)

5 minutes ago, monstah said:

Sorry, those are Module Manager files that do... stuff. If you don't know what they are, you probably have none (that you wrote yourself, that is. Some of those mods you have are just that)

I do have ModuleManager.2.6.23 installed, but that's it.

I tried un-installing KIS now. It fixed the issue. Thank you very much. However, I love KIS a lot. Is there a way to work-around this bug while having KIS installed?
I have same problem and it must be KIS as far as I can see
Its caused by Kerbal Crash System, when you have KIS installed.
